name: unthinkingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without someone seriously thinking about or intending something: I really didn't mean to offend her - I just said it unthinkingly. "You're pregnant!" Melissa exclaimed unthinkingly. See
unthinking
More examplesFewer examplesUnthinkingly, I dialled the number, my fingers shaking.He had unthinkingly humiliated her, wounding her feelings.She had acted unthinkingly and was punished.
